0.en: Oh, my goodness, they've all gotten so big. Which one is which again?
0.cn: 哦，天呐，他们都这么大了！哪个是哪个啊？

1.en: And I didn't want to go plan my wedding with something so big weighing on my mind.
1.cn: 我不想在规划自己婚礼的时候心里有这么大个包袱。

2.en: Freddy Fox has a very good sense of smell. Wow. What an egg. It's huge. Why is the egg so big? It's a dinosaur egg.
2.cn: 狐狸弗雷迪的嗅觉非常的灵敏。哇，这颗蛋可真大啊！这是一颗巨大的蛋！为什么这颗蛋这么大呢？这是一颗恐龙蛋。

3.en: That is big. So big. And ugly. So ugly.
3.cn: 这画真大。超大。画得好丑。超丑。

4.en: Yeah, so big that actually makes our doors look smaller.
4.cn: 是很大，显得我们的门看起来小了。

5.en: Jack, the world is so big. It's so big, you wouldn't even believe it. And Room is just one stinky part of it.
5.cn: 杰克，这个世界很大很大很大，大到你无法相信，而房间只是其中臭烘烘的一部分。

6.en: So big they dragged behind me when I walked. And they were strong.
6.cn: 大到我走路时候和我并肩，它们很强壮。

7.en: Well, maybe it's so big because the house was built on radioactive waste.
7.cn: 也许是因为房子盖在辐射废料掩埋的地上。

8.en: Whoa. Is this Riley? She's so big now. She won't fit in my rocket. How're we gonna get to the moon.
8.cn: 哇哦，这是莱莉吗？她现在已经很大了，不能进去我的火箭里了，那我们怎么去月球。

9.en: It will be so big that even though it's happening here in California you will feel it on the east coast.
9.cn: 震动会极为强烈，即便是在加利福尼亚发生的地震，你在东海岸也会有震感。

10.en: I love pumpkin pie! And because Daddy Pig's pumpkin is so big, there will be enough pumpkin pie for everyone! Hurray!
10.cn: 我喜欢吃南瓜派！因为猪爸爸种的南瓜非常大所以我们每个人都可以吃到南瓜派！真棒！

11.en: But even with the inspiration of others, it's understandable that we sometimes think the world's problems are so big that we can do little to help.
11.cn: 尽管我们常常从他人身上获得鼓舞，但有时候仍会觉得世界问题繁多，我们力量甚微且无措。
